rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型双靶点 CAR T 细胞疗法有望治疗复发性胶质母细胞瘤根据早期研究结果，通过 CAR T 细胞疗法靶向两种脑肿瘤相关蛋白（而不是一种），有望成为减少复发性胶质母细胞瘤 (GBM)（一种侵袭性脑癌）患者实体瘤生长的策略。由宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院和宾夕法尼亚大学医学院艾布拉姆森癌症中心的研究人员领导的正在进行的一期临床试验中，首批六名患者接受了治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Novel-dual-target-CAR-T-cell-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-recurrent-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Novel-dual-target-CAR-T-cell-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-recurrent-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a42a79c4-877c-46dc-8930-58826906c08f Wed, 13 Mar 2024 13:59:03 -0400 Novel dual-target CAR T cell therapy shows promise in treating recurrent glioblastoma
启动新合作以支持亨尼帕病毒疫苗的开发英国卫生安全局 (UKHSA) 和皮尔布赖特研究所之间启动了一项新的合作，以支持亨尼帕病毒疫苗的开发，亨尼帕病毒是包括尼帕病毒在内的病毒属（或组）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/New-collaboration-launched-to-support-the-development-of-vaccines-against-henipavirus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/New-collaboration-launched-to-support-the-development-of-vaccines-against-henipavirus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4dea31e2-3330-46eb-8f26-6cf4dbb0edcb Wed, 13 Mar 2024 13:55:26 -0400 New collaboration launched to support the development of vaccines against henipavirus
父母的触摸可以缓解新生儿的急性手术疼痛和父母的焦虑儿科神经影像小组与早产儿或患病婴儿慈善机构 Bliss 合作，为新生儿父母推出了一套新的信息资源，旨在让他们对参与护理更有信心他们的孩子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Parental-touch-can-relieve-acute-procedural-pain-in-neonates-and-parents-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Parental-touch-can-relieve-acute-procedural-pain-in-neonates-and-parents-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd6852d3-add2-4094-b951-3bee70a04580 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 13:39:28 -0400 Parental touch can relieve acute procedural pain in neonates and parents' anxiety
研究人员确定了早期检测和治疗动脉粥样硬化的潜在新方法动脉粥样硬化引起的动脉血管阻塞是导致心脏病和中风的主要原因，而心脏病和中风是全世界最常见的死亡原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Researchers-identify-pottial-new-approaches-for-early-detection-and-treatment-of-atherosclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Researchers-identify-pottial-new-approaches-for-early-detection-and-treatment-of-atherosclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34b69c60-d89c-49aa-8be6-0d88569c3211 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 13:30:00 -0400 Researchers identify potential new approaches for early detection and treatment of atherosclerosis
多种大气污染物可能引发儿童哮喘症状最近的一项分析表明，接触多种有毒大气污染物的组合可能会引发儿童哮喘症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Multiple-atmospheric-pollutants-may-be-triggering-asthma-symptoms-among-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Multiple-atmospheric-pollutants-may-be-triggering-asthma-symptoms-among-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=971f7579-2f4a-4dff-864c-47bdc411f5ff Wed, 13 Mar 2024 13:11:45 -0400 Multiple atmospheric pollutants may be triggering asthma symptoms among children
急性营养不良会增加幼儿疟疾治疗失败的风险非洲和亚洲患有急性营养不良的儿童即使接受了目前最好的和推荐的疟疾治疗，治疗失败和疟疾再次感染的风险也更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Acute-malnutrition-raises-risk-of-malaria-treatment-failure-in-young-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Acute-malnutrition-raises-risk-of-malaria-treatment-failure-in-young-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=556657fd-5d37-4884-9c85-1227a42707e8 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 13:07:40 -0400 Acute malnutrition raises risk of malaria treatment failure in young children
自我引导的数字行为疗法可以成为失眠的替代解决方案安眠药是解决失眠的唯一方法吗？弗林德斯大学的亚历山大·斯威特曼博士表示并非如此，他说使用自我引导的数字行为疗法是应该考虑的替代解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Self-guided-digital-behavioral-therapy-can-be-an-alternative-solution-for-insomnia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Self-guided-digital-behavioral-therapy-can-be-an-alternative-solution-for-insomnia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=312f9da0-b109-45f0-a55e-8172fcd1af4f Wed, 13 Mar 2024 12:55:30 -0400 Self-guided digital behavioral therapy can be an alternative solution for insomnia
与多动症症状相关的非典型大脑连接美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的研究人员发现，注意力缺陷/多动障碍 (ADHD) 的症状与大脑额叶皮层和大脑深处的信息处理中心之间的非典型相互作用有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Atropic-brain-connections-linked-to-ADHD-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Atropic-brain-connections-linked-to-ADHD-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1796b20-17dc-4fba-bc7c-a13e71c9d935 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 12:50:49 -0400 Atypical brain connections linked to ADHD symptoms
理光与 ERS ​​Genomics 签订 CRISPR/Cas9 许可协议https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Ricoh-and-ERS-Genomics-enter-into-CRISPRCas9-license-agreement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Ricoh-and-ERS-Genomics-enter-into-CRISPRCas9-license-agreement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81290f25-4d25-4b42-97db-5ee2fe1c44c4 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 12:43:00 -0400 Ricoh and ERS Genomics enter into CRISPR/Cas9 license agreement
研究为终末期肾病和肥胖患者带来新希望减肥和移植手术团队之间的一项合作研究为患有终末期肾病（ESRD）且与肥胖作斗争的患者带来了新的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Study-offers-new-hope-for-病人-suffering-from-end-stage-renal-disease-and-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Study-offers-new-hope-for-病人-suffering-from-end-stage-renal-disease-and-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7aac68cc-c21f-4876-b3c9-f0102c0afc8f Wed, 13 Mar 2024 12:37:49 -0400 Study offers new hope for patients suffering from end-stage renal disease and obesity
